articles.description: Wales are in the Euro 2024 play-offs draw from 11:00 GMT, while Stephen Kenny's contract as Republic of Ireland boss will not be renewed,
articles.title: Wales await play-off draw & Republic seek new boss

articles.description: Wales will face Finland in a Euro 2024 play-off semi-final on 21 March in Cardiff and will also be at home if they reach the play-off final.
articles.title: Wales host Finland in Euro 2024 play-off semis

articles.description: Jake Daniels, the UK's only openly gay active male professional footballer, speaks about his mental health, Jordan Henderson and the 18 months since coming out.
articles.title: Henderson's Saudi move a 'slap in the face' - Daniels

articles.description: Former Indies batter Marlon Samuels is banned from all cricket for six years for breaching anti-corruption rules.
articles.title: Samuels given six-year ban for anti-corruption breach

articles.description: Wembley's arch will only be lit for football and entertainment under a new policy approved by the board of the Football Association.
articles.title: FA to limit lighting of Wembley arch

articles.description: There was little fanfare when Frank Soo passed away in 1991, but his story as the first non-white England international has emerged from obscurity since.
articles.title: England's pioneer who died with a tale untold

articles.description: In her BBC Sport column, Amanda Serrano says Katie Taylor's legacy is untouchable - but still expects Chantelle Cameron to beat her old rival on Saturday in Dublin.
articles.title: Taylor has never backed down from a challenge - Serrano

articles.description: County champions Surrey will start the 2024 season with a trip to face Lancashire at Emirates Old Trafford
articles.title: Champions Surrey start 2024 season at Lancashire

articles.description: As the United States celebrates Thanksgiving BBC Sport takes a look back at some of the best Premier League goals by Americans.
articles.title: Watch best goals by Americans in the Premier League

articles.description: Adrian Newey - the greatest designer in Formula 1 history - sits down with BBC Sport's Andrew Benson.
articles.title: Inside the mind of Red Bull's design genius
